name: Electro-Twixt
description:
In Electro-Twixt, you play as a paranormal investigator who came to town to close unstable rifts which are letting ghosts run amok!

  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse to fire an EMF blast at the ghosts
  • Right mouse to search for the nearest haunted house
  • G to toggle your goggles on/off
  • Zap ghosts to recharge your goggles (lets you see rifts to destroy them as well as seeing ghosts farther away)
  • Watch out! If ghosts hit you, they take away some of your EMF charge (look around near houses to find batteries to recharge your EMF)
  • Close all rifts and defeat the ghosts to win the game!

Bugfix 10/5/21 12:19am CST: "ESC" key now brings up pause menu as intended

Description updated 10/6/21 to include batteries based on initial reviewer suggestions
